short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Swap showdown titles so they're all ordered properly; regain sanity.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds buttons to the showdown section of BoxOfficeMojo's homepage so you can easily swap them, particularly for sequel showdowns that are not consistently in the right spot.
